column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last month I visited my relatives who live 500 miles away .
#id=2
#text=I did n't want to drive all the way there myself , so I decided one of the best methods for me to get there would be to take a train .
#id=3
#text=Since I have n't traveled on a train before I did n't know where I should begin .
#id=4
#text=I decided to look online for instructions on what to do .
#id=5
#text=Luckily I was able to find all the necessary information to make my trip possible .
#id=6
#text=The next day I drove over to the train station and parked in the secured parking lot .
#id=7
#text=I went over to the ticket booth and paid for a ticket , it cost me around $ 50 .
#id=8
#text=I then waited for the train to arrive .
#id=9
#text=Once it did I got on board and stored my belongings in the luggage compartment .
#text=I then took a seat and relaxed .
#text=The train started up , and after a couple of hours I reached my destination .
#text=It was an interesting and fun experience .
